name: Ext_R4_ObservationDefinition_criticalCodedValueSet
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.ObservationDefinition.criticalCodedValueSet for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ObservationDefinition.criticalCodedValueSet from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ObservationDefinition|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Value set of critical coded values for the observations conforming to this ObservationDefinition
element.definition: The set of critical coded results for the observation conforming to this ObservationDefinition.
element.comment: `ObservationDefinition.criticalCodedValueSet` has no related element in R5:ObservationDefinition

element.short: Value set of critical coded values for the observations conforming to this ObservationDefinition
element.definition: The set of critical coded results for the observation conforming to this ObservationDefinition.
element.comment: `ObservationDefinition.criticalCodedValueSet` has no related element in R5:ObservationDefinition
